import serializeForm from "form-serialize"; const ShelfMain=({shelf,listBook,updateShelf})=>{ const handleupdate=(b,event,ol)=> { event.preventDefault(); if(updateShelf){ updateShelf(b,event.target.value) } } return(

{shelf}

    {listBook .filter( (b) => b.shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() === shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() ) .map((book) => (
  1. handleupdate(book.id,e,book.shelf)}>
    {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } export default ShelfMain;
